pages: <!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/talks/2019/01/20/15-35-%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B8-%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B2-%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%88%D0%B5-%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%BE.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/georgitomov.jpg" alt="Георги Томов: Не трябва да се пише единствено небрежно">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/talks/2019/01/20/15-35-%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B8-%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%BE%D0%B2-%D0%BD%D0%B5-%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%88%D0%B5-%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%BD%D0%BE.html">Георги Томов: Не трябва да се пише единствено небрежно</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Не мога да чета произведения, които са претупани, в които има множество „карай, може й така“. Не, не може така, категоричен е авторът на множество разкази и два романа, последния...</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/talks">Разговори за писането</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                20                        Януари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->

<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/talks/2019/01/20/15-27-%D0%BA%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%BE-%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82-%D0%B7%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%BB%D0%BE-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%88%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5-%D0%B8-%D0%BA%D1%8A%D0%BC-%D0%B6%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B0.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/keranaangelova.jpg" alt="Керана Ангелова: Талантливите по начало имат зряло отношение и към живота">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/talks/2019/01/20/15-27-%D0%BA%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%87%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%BE-%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B0%D1%82-%D0%B7%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%BB%D0%BE-%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%88%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B5-%D0%B8-%D0%BA%D1%8A%D0%BC-%D0%B6%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%B0.html">Керана Ангелова: Талантливите по начало имат зряло отношение и към живота</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Младите поети са чели много, разбира се, и имат литературната база. Силно интуитивни са и много интелигентни и тази комбинация е особено характерна за новото поколение поети, смята писателката и...</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/talks">Разговори за писането</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                20                        Януари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->

<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/talks/2019/01/20/14-07-%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD%D1%83%D0%B8%D0%BB-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5-%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B8-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%B8-%D1%81%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%BE-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%B1%D0%BE%D1%80.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/emanuilvidinski.jpg" alt="Емануил А. Видински: Простите думи винаги са по-добрият избор">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/talks/2019/01/20/14-07-%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD%D1%83%D0%B8%D0%BB-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B8-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5-%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B8-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D0%B8-%D1%81%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%BE-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F%D1%82-%D0%B8%D0%B7%D0%B1%D0%BE%D1%80.html">Емануил А. Видински: Простите думи винаги са по-добрият избор</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Емануил А. Видински e писател, поет, музикант и преподавател по творческо писане в Творческа Академия "Заешка Дупка". Автор е на сборниците с разкази "Картографии на бягството" и "Егон и тишината",...</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/talks">Разговори за писането</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                20                        Януари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->
